name: Angry Duck
description:
Game submitted for the I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again) Game Jam
Everything was coded, cooked, pixel-painted with ♥♥♥

Somewhere near Reunion Island lives a royal duck couple very much in passionate love.

Their lives cramped of happiness were peaceful and unencumbered, filled with love and wealth, the couple was so joyful that the whole ocean was amazed by such harmony between two angelic beings.
One spring day, the most historic event in the boundless ocean happened: the lovely Duckys' wedding. The most formal wedding since the one of Cthulhu in the glorious past.

The whole ocean naturally had to join the grand festivities: Whales, jellyfish, crabs, seagulls, the whole maritime world moved for the extraordinary occasion.
But from light came darkness, and this couple was radiant with happiness.
The same day as the announcement of the wedding, but in the shallow waters of Martiniquan a marital dispute exploded. A jealous octopus father gave his octopus wife an ultimatum, to choose between his dear child or the unique marriage. It goes without saying, she couldn't skip this thousand-year-old event and the father fled with the child that very day.

Torn by the cruel separation from his mother, youthful Bob, was then left in the hands of his father, an alcoholic, violent and gambling addict octopus. Bob experienced a traumatic childhood that forged him body and soul.
Bob, a few years later a mature octopus, was obsessed with only two things: Duckys' and raw shrimp. The dear couple who obsessed the marine world. Their love was worth more than an innocent child.

Riddled with hatred and revenge, Bob stopped being passive and took up arms: he raised an overwhelming army of outcasts, fellow creatures, abandoned children... To fight the couple whose happiness had unintentionally caused so much unhappiness.
Bob succeeded, he kidnapped the most coveted woman of the seven seas in a frontal attack, his nefarious plan was perfect...
But he omitted one thing: Ducky... Can Ducky save Roxaaaaane from the Evil Bob ?!
How many innocent animals will be killed ?!?
How much money is the bullets worth ?!?!?
Is Ducky the bad guy ?!?!?!?
Why am I doing this ?!?!?!?!?

Key Action WASD
Move Ducky the Immortal Left Click Shot baby ! Escape Pause the game
